entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature falling to zero this morning then steady.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning then changing to a few rain showers this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to zero this morning then steady. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
